Title: peanut-butter-and-banana-french-toast
Ingredients:
1 egg
 1 dash vanilla extract
 2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter
 2 slices bread
 1 small banana, sliced
 2 tablespoons butter

Title: hawaiian-french-toast
Ingredients:
3 eggs, separated
 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
 1 teaspoon grated orange zest
 1/2 teaspoon rum flavored extract
 1 tablespoon water
 1 tablespoon honey
 1 (1 pound) loaf hawaiian sweet bread, thickly sliced
 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
 1 (3 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
 3 tablespoons honey
 1 cup maple syrup

Title: sunny-orange-french-toast
Ingredients:
1 1/2 cups cream of wheat cereal
 3 eggs, slightly beaten
 3/4 teaspoon grated orange peel
 1 cup orange juice
 3 tablespoons granulated sugar
 1 teaspoon vanilla
 12 slices firm white bread (3/4-inch thick)
 1/4 cup margarine or butter , divided, powdered sugar (optional)

Title: grandmas-peach-french-toast
Ingredients:
1 cup packed brown sugar
 1/2 cup butter
 2 tablespoons water
 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches, drained
 12 (3/4 inch thick) slices day-old french bread
 5 eggs
 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste

Title: whole-wheat-french-toast-with-peaches
Ingredients:
1 cup packed brown sugar
 1/2 cup butter
 2 tablespoons water
 1 (16 ounce) package frozen sliced peaches, thawed
 12 slices sara lee\xae soft & smooth\u2122 whole grain white bread
 3/4 cup liquid egg substitute
 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, ground cinnamon to taste

Title: uncle-jesses-french-toast
Ingredients:
4 eggs
 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg
 1 teaspoon ground ginger
 1 teaspoon ground cloves
 15 slices whole wheat bread
 1 cup butter, divided
 1 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting

Title: french-toast
Ingredients:
3 large eggs
 1 pinch fine salt
 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
 3 tablespoons unsalted butter
 6 slices fresh challah, confectioners' sugar, maple syrup or jam for serving

Title: pumpkin-french-toast
Ingredients:
4 eggs
 1/4 cup canned pumpkin puree
 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 1 pinch ground nutmeg
 8 slices whole wheat bread
 2 teaspoons butter

Title: sweet-potato-french-toast
Ingredients:
1/4 cup mashed sweet potatoes
 4 eggs
 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg
 8 slices whole wheat bread

Title: vanilla-banana-french-toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs
 3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon
 2 1/4 teaspoons white sugar
 2 slices bread
 1 banana, sliced

Title: whole-grain-french-toast-with-blackberry-compote
Ingredients:
2 (6 ounce) containers fresh blackberries
 1 tablespoon honey (optional)
 1 egg, separated
 1 egg white
 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
 5 slices whole-grain bread
